Group QuestionnaireItem

Documentation:

Questions and sections within the Questionnaire.

Ancestors:
  • QuestionnaireItem
Used By:
  • Questionnaire, 
  • QuestionnaireItem

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      IdentifierString

      An id for the item expressed as a string.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      IdentifierString
      1..1
      DetailsUri

      A URI that refers to an ElementDefinition that provides information about this item, including information that might otherwise be included in the instance of the Questionnaire resource.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      DetailsUri
      0..1
      Code

      The main type identifier for a lab, procedure, condition, etc., usually drawn from a controlled vocabulary.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      Code
      0..*
      http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/questionnaire-questions (EXAMPLE)
      Prefix

      A string that should precede the item; for example, an honorific before a person's name, or a question number before a question.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Prefix
      0..1
      Question

      The text of the question.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Question
      0..1
      Type

      A code describing the item at a greater level of detail.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Type
      1..1
      EnableWhen

      A constraint indicating that this item should only be enabled (displayed/allow answers to be captured) when the specified condition is true.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      EnableWhen
      0..*
      EnableBehavior

      Controls how multiple enableWhen values are interpreted - whether all or any must be true.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      EnableBehavior
      0..1
      IsRequired

      An indication, if true, that the item may occur multiple times in the response, collecting multiple answers answers for questions or multiple sets of answers for groups.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      IsRequired
      0..1
      MayRepeat

      An indication, if true, that the item may occur multiple times in the response, collecting multiple answers answers for questions or multiple sets of answers for groups.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      MayRepeat
      0..1
      IsReadOnly

      An indication, when true, that the value cannot be changed by a human respondent to the Questionnaire.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      IsReadOnly
      0..1
      MaxTextLength

      The maximum number of characters that are permitted in a text field.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      MaxTextLength
      0..1
      AnswerValueSet

      Canonical URL of the valueset containing permitted answers.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      AnswerValueSet
      0..1
      AnswerOption

      One of the permitted answers for a 'choice' or 'open-choice' question, and whether that answer should be initially selected.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      AnswerOption
      0..*
      PrepopulateValue

      One or more values that should be pre-populated in the answer when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input.
      DataType
